name: Hyperspaced
description:
Help a human spaceship collect all 8 pieces of its broken jumpdrive in order to escape a hyperspace trap set up by some menacing aliens!

In Hyperspaced you control a simplistic spaceship which turn around and thrust forward, while trying to shoot down and outsmart an ever-growing amount of aliens. While you do not have a proper jumpdrive (meaning you cannot escape), you can still "flip" into hyperspace and back.

Note that while there are some asteroids, they serve more as a backdrop than as an obstacle or a goal. You cannot break them by shooting, but they cannot break you either if you slam into one.

Made in 3 hours, with the exception of the main menu (which just lists the controls and a snip of the "story"). Font and certain UI elements are not my work, instead, they are part of the default Godot engine theme.
